results.name: Denominators in expansion of exp(2x)/(1-x).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
formula: a(n) = denominator( Sum_{k=0..n} 2^k/k! ). - _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 18 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 15 2000
